iristk.audio

Class AudioSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • iristk.audio.AudioPort
      • iristk.audio.AudioSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileAudioSource, Microphone, NetworkAudioSource, SoundAudioSource

    public abstract class AudioSource
extends AudioPort
implements java.lang.Runnable
    AudioSource acts as an input AudioPort which contains a thread that actively reads audio from a port. To access this audio, one or more AudioListeners must be attached.
